name: rabblerouser-core
description: A pluggable, extensible membership database for community organising

scripts.test: npm run test-jasmine && npm run test-mocha
scripts.acceptanceTestsStaging: NODE_ENV=test PHANTOMJS_EXECUTABLE=./node_modules/phantomjs/bin/phantomjs ./node_modules/casperjs/bin/casperjs --web-security=true --log-level=debug --verbose test spec/acceptance/user_journey.js spec/acceptance/admin_journey.js --url=https://lab-assistant-staging.herokuapp.com --email=$ACCEPTANCE_EMAIL --password=$ACCEPTANCE_PASSWORD | grep -v 'Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame' | grep -v -e '^$'
scripts.e2e: NODE_ENV=test PHANTOMJS_EXECUTABLE=phantomjs casperjs --web-security=true --log-level=debug --verbose test e2e-tmp/test-bundle.js --url=http://localhost:3000 | grep -v 'Unsafe JavaScript attempt to access frame' | grep -v -e '^$'
